Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

r2dii.data (development version) Unreleased

r2dii.data 0.2.2 2021-09-03

  • region_isos now outputs all expected regions for: weo_2020 and isf_2020 (#253 @Antoine-Lalechere).

r2dii.data 0.2.1 2021-07-09

  • region_isos gains data for new scenario sources: weo_2020, isf_2020 and nze_2021 (#241 @georgeharris2deg).

r2dii.data 0.2.0 2021-06-29

  • ald_demo and scenario_demo_2020 gain rows of dummy data for the hdv (heavy-duty vehicle) sector (#231).
  • ald_demo gains the column leiand loses the column is_ultimate_listed_owner. Also the column id_company becomes company_id and ald_emission_factor_unit becomes emission_factor_unit (#233).
  • In ald_demo, the column id_company is now unique for each name_company and sector pair (#232).
  • In all sector classification datasets, the column code is now consistently of type “character”.

r2dii.data 0.1.9 2021-03-01

  • In sector_classifications and psic_classification, all values of sector are now lowercase (#222 @daisy-pacheco).

r2dii.data 0.1.8 2021-02-22

  • Remove leading zeroes from the column code of the dataset psic_classification (#218 @daisy-pacheco).
  • ald_demo gains column id_company (@vintented #197).
  • nace_classification codes for automotive sales now have borderline values of TRUE (@KapitanKombajn #213).

r2dii.data 0.1.7 2021-02-08

  • Add heavy-duty vehicles to green_or_brown, loanbook_demo, and ald_demo (@vintented #131).
  • New dataset psic_classification (@daisy-pacheco #199).

r2dii.data 0.1.6 2020-12-05

  • region_isos now correctly maps Kosovo iso to “xk” (@cjyetman #186).
  • region_isos now includes more missing isos for all global regions (#183).
  • Add missing sectors to nace_classification (@georgeharris2deg #171).
  • Fix borderline definitions in isic_classification and nace_classification (@georgeharris2deg #163).
  • New dataset cnb_classification (@georgeharris2deg #173).

r2dii.data 0.1.4 2020-10-08

  • Change license to CC0; it’s the most appropriate for sharing data (#161).
  • New dataset gics_classification (@georgeharris2deg #162).
  • The definition of borderline is now clearer (@georgeharris2deg #163).

r2dii.data 0.1.3 2020-09-12

  • Change license to MIT.
  • The website’s home page now acknowledges funders.
  • The website’s home page now reports test coverage.
  • The “News” tab of the website now shows all releases to date.
  • Replace ‘ton’ and ‘tons’ with ‘tonne’ and ‘tonnes’ (#134).
  • Fix typos in columns definitions.

r2dii.data 0.1.2 2020-08-04

  • region_isos no longer has duplicated rows (@jdhoffa #111).
  • New dataset green_or_brown (#124).
  • New dataset sic_classification (@georgeharris2deg, @daisy-pacheco #125).
  • ald_demo drops the column number_of_assets (@tposey28 #121).
  • region_isos gains data from ETP 2017 (@jdhoffa #110).
  • Require R >= 3.4, which is what we check for (@maurolepore #117).

r2dii.data 0.1.1 2020-06-10

  • naics_classification now includes only 6-digit codes (@QianFeng2020 #102; @jdhoffa #103).

r2dii.data 0.1.0 2020-06-03

  • r2dii.data is now maturing.
  • naics_classification now includes correct data (@QianFeng2020 #85; @maurolepore #94).
  • region_isos now includes a “global” region (@jdhoffa #52).
  • region_isos gains the column source and updates from WEO2019 (@jdhoffa #50).
  • ald_demo gains the column ald_emission_factor_unit (#71).
  • New dataset co2_intensity_scenario_demo (@jdhoffa #83).
  • New dataset region_isos_demo (#60).
  • New dataset scenario_demo_2020 (#37).

r2dii.data 0.0.3 2020-03-25

  • First release on CRAN.

Contents

Developed by Mauro Lepore, Jackson Hoffart, Klaus Hagedorn, 2 Degrees Investing Initiative.
